body.speaker: Fran
body.text: I became a detective since all the movies and books made them seem cool... but this job is {rate:0.2}SO BORING.

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: I hope something exciting happens around here sometime soon...

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Is that a client?! Maybe god heard my plees and decided to give me something exciting!

body.speaker: Old Man
body.text: Hello I saw a flier for this place... is this Fran's Detective Agency?

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Why yes! Is there anything I can help you with today?{rate:0.5} {rate:0.02}Perhaps a murder{rate:0.5}...{rate:0.02} {sfx:bam}Or a phantom thief is on the loose??

body.speaker: Old Man
body.text: My poor pooch has ran away while I was taking him on a walk in the forest, and I'm afraid I need help finding him.

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Well, I suppose this is what I should have expected.

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Can you tell me what the dog looks like and where in the forest you lost them?

body.speaker: Old man
body.text: Pooch has pointy ears and has a silly high pitched bark that is distinct from other dogs. He ran off around{rate:0.5}... {rate:0.05}here in the forest during our walk

body.speaker: Fran
body.text: Great. I suppose I don't have much else to do right now so I might as well start searching now...

body.speaker: Old Man
body.text: Oh thank you so much! I hope pooch is safe, poor boy.
